column4: hello fellow ubuntu users - I'm wondering if it is possible to install pacman(Arch linux package manager) on ubuntu?
yes and no, yes its theoretically possible but its something that will break the system at the very least
Hmm, I'm thinking of switching to arch, but I think that i forgot to put my home on a seperate partition :(
/home is not affected by a package manager, or distro for the most part
